resources.string: Overlay permission is needed. Please grant it to use the ruler.
Drag the 7 orange handles to position the lines. Use \'Close\' in overlay or \'Stop Ruler\' here.
This app needs permission to display ruler lines over other apps. Without this permission, the ruler cannot work.

This app displays 7 vertical ruler lines over other apps.

1. Tap 'Start Ruler' (or 'Grant Permission' if needed).
2. Drag the numbered orange handles at the top to move each line horizontally.
3. The lines stay visible when you switch to other apps.
4. Tap the 'Close' button in the overlay (bottom-right) to hide the lines.
5. You can also stop the ruler from this app's main screen.
The ruler cannot function without the overlay permission. Please grant the permission if you wish to use the ruler.
